items.name: Small Blind
items.effect: None.

items.name: Big Blind
items.effect: None.

items.name: The Hook
items.effect: Discards 2 random cards per hand played

items.name: The Ox
items.effect: Playing a [most played hand] sets money to $0

items.name: The House
items.effect: First hand is drawn face down

items.name: The Wall
items.effect: Extra large blind

items.name: The Wheel
items.effect: 1 in 7 cards get drawn face down

items.name: The Arm
items.effect: Decrease level of played poker hand

items.name: The Club
items.effect: All ♣️ cards are debuffed

items.name: The Fish
items.effect: Cards drawn face down after each hand played

items.name: The Psychic
items.effect: Must play 5 cards

items.name: The Goad
items.effect: All ♠️ cards are debuffed

items.name: The Water
items.effect: Start with 0 discards

items.name: The Window
items.effect: All ♦️ cards are debuffed

items.name: The Manacle
items.effect: -1 hand size

items.name: The Eye
items.effect: No repeat hand types this round

items.name: The Mouth
items.effect: Play only 1 hand type this round

items.name: The Plant
items.effect: All face cards are debuffed

items.name: The Serpent
items.effect: After Play or Discard, always draw 3 cards

items.name: The Pillar
items.effect: Cards played previously this Ante are debuffed

items.name: The Needle
items.effect: Play only 1 hand

items.name: The Head
items.effect: All ♥️ cards are debuffed

items.name: The Tooth
items.effect: Lose $1 per card played

items.name: The Flint
items.effect: Base Chips and Mult are halved

items.name: The Mark
items.effect: All face cards are drawn face down

items.name: Amber Acorn
items.effect: Flips and shuffles all Joker cards

items.name: Verdant Leaf
items.effect: All cards debuffed until 1 Joker sold

items.name: Violet Vessel
items.effect: Very large blind

items.name: Crimson Heart
items.effect: One random Joker disabled every hand

items.name: Cerulean Bell
items.effect: Forces 1 card to always be selected

items.name: Arcana Pack
items.effect: Choose 1 of up to 3 Tarot cards to be used immediately

items.name: Jumbo Arcana Pack
items.effect: Choose 1 of up to 5 Tarot cards to be used immediately

items.name: Mega Arcana Pack
items.effect: Choose 2 of up to 5 Tarot cards to be used immediately

items.name: Celestial Pack
items.effect: Choose 1 of up to 3 Planet cards to be used immediately

items.name: Jumbo Celestial Pack
items.effect: Choose 1 of up to 5 Planet cards to be used immediately

items.name: Mega Celestial Pack
items.effect: Choose 2 of up to 5 Planet cards to be used immediately

items.name: Standard Pack
items.effect: Choose 1 of up to 3 Playing cards to add to your deck

items.name: Jumbo Standard Pack
items.effect: Choose 1 of up to 5 Playing cards to add to your deck

items.name: Mega Standard Pack
items.effect: Choose 2 of up to 5 Playing cards to add to your deck

items.name: Buffoon Pack
items.effect: Choose 1 of up to 2 Joker cards

items.name: Jumbo Buffoon Pack
items.effect: Choose 1 of up to 4 Joker cards

items.name: Mega Buffoon Pack
items.effect: Choose 2 of up to 4 Joker cards

items.name: Spectral Pack
items.effect: Choose 1 of up to 2 Spectral cards to be used immediately

items.name: Jumbo Spectral Pack
items.effect: Choose 1 of up to 4 Spectral cards to be used immediately

items.name: Mega Spectral Pack
items.effect: Choose 2 of up to 4 Spectral cards to be used immediately

items.name: Red
items.effect: +1 discard every round.

items.name: Blue
items.effect: +1 hand every round.
items.unlock_requirement: Discover at least 20 items from your collection.

items.name: Yellow
items.effect: Start with extra $10.
items.unlock_requirement: Discover at least 50 items from your collection.

items.name: Green
items.effect: At the end of each Round: $2 per remaining Hand, $1 per remaining Discard, Earn no interest.
items.unlock_requirement: Discover at least 75 items from your collection.

items.name: Black
items.effect: +1 Joker slot, -1 hand every round.
items.unlock_requirement: Discover at least 100 items from your collection.

items.name: Magic
items.effect: Start run with the Crystal Ball voucher active and two copies of The Fool.
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run with Red Deck on any difficulty.

items.name: Nebula
items.effect: Start run with the Telescope voucher active, -1 consumable slot.
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run with Blue Deck on any difficulty.

items.name: Ghost
items.effect: Spectral cards may appear in the shop, start with a Hex card.
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run with Yellow Deck on any difficulty.

items.name: Abandoned
items.effect: Start run with no Face Cards in your deck.
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run with Green Deck on any difficulty.

items.name: Checkered
items.effect: Start run with 26 Spades and 26 Hearts in deck.
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run with Black Deck on any difficulty.

items.name: Zodiac
items.effect: Start run with Tarot Merchant, Planet Merchant, and Overstock.
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run on any deck with at least Red Stake difficulty.

items.name: Painted
items.effect: +2 hand size, -1 Joker slot.
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run on any deck with at least Green Stake difficulty.

items.name: Anaglyph
items.effect: After defeating each Boss Blind, gain a Double Tag.
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run on any deck with at least Black Stake difficulty.

items.name: Plasma
items.effect: Balance Chips and Mult when calculating score for played hand, X2 base Blind size
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run on any deck with at least Blue Stake difficulty.

items.name: Erratic
items.effect: All Ranks and Suits in deck are randomized
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run on any deck with at least Orange Stake difficulty.

items.name: Challenge
items.effect: Deck used in Challenge mode
items.unlock_requirement: Unlocked by default in Challenge mode.

items.name: Bonus
items.effect: +30 extra chips

items.name: Glass
items.effect: x2 Mult, 1 in 4 chance to destroy card

items.name: Gold
items.effect: $3 if this card is held in hand at end of round

items.name: Lucky
items.effect: 1 in 5 chance for +20 Mult. 1 in 15 chance to win $20

items.name: Mult
items.effect: +4 Mult

items.name: Steel
items.effect: x1.5 Mult while this card stays in hand

items.name: Stone
items.effect: +50 Chips, no rank or suit
items.unlock_requirement: Note that Stone cards have no rank or suit, rather than being their own. Stone cards secretly retain a rank and suit like other playing cards, but they cannot be determined or used in scoring until the Stone enhancement is cleared or replaced.

items.name: Wild
items.effect: Can be used as any suit

items.name: Joker
items.effect: +4 Mult
items.unlock_requirement: Play Black deck 2 times • Play Yellow deck.

items.effect: Played cards with ♠️ Spade suit give +3 Mult when scored

items.effect: Played cards with ♣️ Club suit give +3 Mult when scored

items.effect: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Straight

items.effect: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Two Pair

items.effect: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Straight

items.name: Crafty Joker
items.effect: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Flush

items.effect: +20 Mult if played hand contains 3 or fewer cards

items.effect: X1 Mult for each empty Joker slot

items.name: Four Fingers
items.effect: All Flushes and Straights can be made with 4 cards

items.effect: Retrigger all card held in hand abilities

items.name: Credit Card
items.effect: Go up to -$20 in debt

items.name: Ceremonial Dagger
items.effect: When Blind is selected, destroy Joker to the right and permanently add double its sell value to this Mult

items.name: Banner
items.effect: +30 Chips for each remaining discard

items.effect: +15 Mult when 0 discards remaining

items.effect: Adds one Stone Card to deck when Blind is selected

items.effect: X4 Mult every 6 hands played

items.effect:
1 in 4 chance for each played 8 to create a Tarot card when scored

items.effect: 1 free Reroll per shop

items.effect: Each played Ace, 2, 3, 5, or 8 gives +8 Mult when scored

items.effect:
Gives X0.2 Mult for each Steel Card in your full deck

items.effect:
+3 Mult for each Joker card

items.effect: Retrigger each played 2, 3, 4, or 5

items.effect: All cards are considered face cards

items.effect: +15 Mult with 1 in 6 chance to be destroyed at end of round

items.name: Egg
items.effect: Gains $3 of sell value at end of round

items.name: Burglar
items.effect: When Blind is selected, gain +3 Hands and lose all discards

items.name: Blackboard
items.effect: X3 Mult if all cards held in hand are ♠️ Spades or ♣️ Clubs

items.name: Ice Cream
items.effect: +100 Chips and -5 Chips for every hand played

items.effect: If first hand of round has only 1 card, add a permanent copy to deck and draw it to hand

items.name: Blue Joker
items.effect: +2 Chips for each remaining card in deck

items.effect: This Joker gains X0.1 Mult for every Planet card used

items.effect: Every played card permanently gains +5 Chips when scored

items.name: Green Joker

items.name: Superposition
items.effect: Create a Tarot card if poker hand contains an Ace and a Straight

items.effect: Earn $4 if poker hand is a [Poker Hand], poker hand changes at end of round

items.effect: X3 Mult with 1 in 1000 chance to be destroyed at end of round

items.effect: X3 Mult if played poker hand has already been played this round

items.name: Riff-raff

items.effect: Gains 0.25x Mult per playing card added to your deck

items.name: Cloud 9

items.effect: If first discard of round has only 1 card, destroy it and earn $3

items.effect: +2 Mult per reroll in the shop

items.effect: Gains +2 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair

items.effect: Each played 10 or 4 gives +10 Chips and +4 Mult

items.effect: x3 Mult on final hand of round

items.effect: ♥️ Hearts and ♦️ Diamonds count as the same suit, ♠️ Spades and ♣️ Clubs count as the same suit

items.effect: X3 Mult if played hand has a scoring ♦️ Diamond card, ♣️ Club card, ♥️ Heart card, and ♠️ Spade card

items.name: Black Hole
items.effect: Upgrade every poker hand by 1 level

items.name: Uncommon Tag
items.effect: Shop has an Uncommon Joker

items.name: Rare Tag
items.effect: Shop has a Rare Joker

items.name: Negative Tag
items.effect: Next base edition shop Joker becomes Negative

items.name: Foil Tag
items.effect: Next base edition shop Joker becomes Foil

items.name: Holographic Tag
items.effect: Next base edition shop Joker becomes Holographic

items.name: Polychrome Tag
items.effect: Next base edition shop Joker becomes Polychrome

items.name: Investment Tag
items.effect: After defeating the Boss Blind, gain $15

items.name: Voucher Tag
items.effect: Adds one Voucher to the next shop

items.name: Boss Tag
items.effect: Rerolls the Boss Blind

items.name: Standard Tag
items.effect: Gives a free Mega Standard Pack

items.name: Charm Tag
items.effect: Gives a free Mega Arcana Pack

items.name: Meteor Tag
items.effect: Gives a free Mega Celestial Pack

items.name: Buffoon Tag
items.effect: Gives a free Mega Buffoon Pack

items.name: Handy Tag
items.effect: Gives $1 per played hand this run. Will give $x

items.name: Garbage Tag
items.effect: Gives $1 per unused discard this run. Will give $x

items.name: Ethereal Tag
items.effect: Gives a free Spectral Pack

items.name: Coupon Tag
items.effect: Initial cards and booster packs in next shop are free

items.name: Double Tag
items.effect: Gives a copy of the next selected Tag. Double Tag excluded

items.name: Juggle Tag
items.effect: +3 hand size next round

items.name: D6 Tag
items.effect: Rerolls in next shop start at $0

items.name: Top-Up Tag
items.effect: Create up to 2 common Jokers. Must have room

items.name: Speed Tag
items.effect: Gives $5 per skipped Blind this run. Will give $x

items.name: Orbital Tag
items.effect: Upgrade [Random Poker Hand] by 3 levels

items.name: Economy Tag
items.effect: Doubles your money. Max of $40

items.name: The Fool
items.effect: Spawns the last Tarot or Planet card used during this run. Excludes The Fool

items.name: The Magician
items.effect: Enhances 1 selected card into a Lucky Card

items.name: The High Priestess
items.effect: Spawns up to 2 random Planet cards. Must have room

items.name: The Empress
items.effect: Enhances up to 2 selected cards to Mult Cards

items.name: The Emperor
items.effect: Creates up to 2 random Tarot cards. Must have room

items.name: The Hierophant
items.effect: Enhances up to 2 selected cards to Bonus Cards

items.name: The Lovers
items.effect: Enhances 1 selected card into a Wild Card

items.name: The Chariot
items.effect: Enhances 1 selected card into a Steel Card

items.name: Justice
items.effect: Enhances 1 selected cardinto a Glass Card

items.name: The Hermit
items.effect: Doubles money. Max of $20.

items.name: The Wheel of Fortune
items.effect: 1 in 4 chance to add Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome edition to a random Joker

items.name: Strength
items.effect: Increases rank of up to 2 selected cards by 1

items.name: The Hanged Man
items.effect: Destroys up to 2 selected cards

items.name: Death
items.effect: Select 2 cards, convert the left card into the right card.

items.name: Temperance
items.effect: Gives the total sell value of all current Jokers. Max of $50.

items.name: The Devil
items.effect: Enhances 1 selected card into a Gold Card

items.name: The Tower
items.effect: Enhances 1 selected card into a Stone Card

items.name: The Star
items.effect: Converts up to 3 selected cards to ♦️

items.name: The Moon
items.effect: Converts up to 3 selected cards to ♣️

items.name: The Sun
items.effect: Converts up to 3 selected cards to ♥️

items.name: Judgement
items.effect: Spawns a random Joker card. Must have room

items.name: The World
items.effect: Converts up to 3 selected cards to ♠️
